# howaboutqiu

> A personal blog by rexarski.

The blog contains random thoughts, ideas, and experiences of the author.

## Sections

- [Home](https://rexarski.com/): The homepage of the blog.
- [Now](https://rexarski.com/now/): Inspired by Derek Sivers, this page contains what the author is currently doing.
- [Posts](https://rexarski.com/posts/): The blog post list.
- [RSS](https://rexarski.com/index.xml): The RSS feed of the blog.
